CADI.Common.Util

Class SampledRange

  • java.lang.Object
    • CADI.Common.Util.SampledRange

  • public class SampledRange
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to record ranges of values. The range of values are from from to to. Moreover, the range of values can optionally be sub-sampled by the samplingFactor factor.

    Only non-negative ranges are allowed.

    If the from value is greater than or equal to the to value, the range is empty.

    For further examples about sampled range, see ISO/IEC 15444-9 section C.2.3, C.4.5, C.4.6, C.4.7

    Version:
    1.0 2011/12/15
    Author:
    Group on Interactive Coding of Images (GICI)

      private int to
      Upper bound of the range.
